author: VinInn
body:
Few technical changes to speed up Track Validation.
More can be done (see old comments in the code for instance)

before
http://innocent.web.cern.ch/innocent/perfResults/igprof-navigator/gpuDQMDebug_ori_CMSSW_12_0_X_2021-04-18-0000_slc7_amd64_gcc900/37
after

Purely technical, no regression expected.
title: Speedup Track Validation
